targets.query: SELECT MODE(last) FROM ( SELECT last("leader") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-new_leader" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY host_id )
SELECT LAST(median) FROM ( SELECT median(count) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-num_nodes" WHERE $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(5s) )

SELECT MEDIAN("host_count") AS "total" FROM ( SELECT COUNT("count") as host_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."vote-native" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host_id ) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

SELECT ROUND(MEAN("sum")) FROM ( SELECT MEDIAN(tx_count) AS sum FROM (SELECT SUM("count")  AS tx_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-replay_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(1s), host_id) GROUP BY time(1s) )

SELECT MAX("median_sum") FROM ( SELECT MEDIAN(tx_count) AS median_sum FROM (SELECT SUM("count") AS tx_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(1s), host_id) GROUP BY time(1s) )
SELECT MEDIAN(tx_count) AS transactions FROM (SELECT SUM("count")  AS tx_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY host_id) WHERE tx_count > 0
SELECT MEDIAN("vote_count") FROM ( SELECT sum("count") as vote_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."vote-native" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY host_id )
SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT median("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT min("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT max("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("duration_ms", 99) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "packets" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."packets-recv_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)

select median("tx_count") as "transactions" from (select sum("count") / 2  as "tx_count" from "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" where $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(2s), host_id) group by time(2s) fill(0)
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "transactions" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-record_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)

select median("tx_count") as "transactions" from (select sum("count") / 2  as "tx_count" from "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" where $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(2s), host_id) group by time(2s) fill(0)
SELECT median("count") AS "total" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-num_nodes" WHERE $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(5s)
SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT "request_amount" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."drone-airdrop" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT mean("duration_ms") / 1000 AS "."  FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."thinclient" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "op"
SELECT last("version")  FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."testnet-deploy"
SELECT SUM("points_written") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."metrics" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT SUM("points_lost") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."metrics" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("one") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."panic" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("killed") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."oom-killer" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("one") as "." FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."panic" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time($__interval), "program" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("points_written") as "Mean points written" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT MAX("points_written") as "Max points written" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT sum(*) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."testnet-deploy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum(*) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."testnet-manager" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("killed") as "." FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."oom-killer" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time($__interval), "victim", "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT time, host_id,program,thread, message FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."panic"  WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT host_id,error FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator_process_entry_error"  WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT host_id,error FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."blocktree_error"  WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT sum("count") AS "total_errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count")  AS "blockhash_too_old" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error-reserve_blockhash" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "account_loaded_twice" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-account_loaded_twice" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "blockhash_not_found" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error-blockhash_not_found" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "duplicate_signature" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error-duplicate_signature" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "insufficient_funds" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error-insufficient_funds" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "account_in_use" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-account_in_use" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "account_not_found" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-account_not_found" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT balance FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-lamport_balance" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT "duration" / 1000 as "Generation Time" FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-generate_txs" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT "duration" / 1000 as "Transmit Time" FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-do_tx_transfers" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT "duration" / 1000 as "Barrier Transaction Confirmation Time" FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-send_barrier_transaction" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") / 3 FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."exchange_processor-trades" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT sum("count") / 3 FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."exchange_processor-swaps" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT sum("count") / 3 AS "trades" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-exchange-trades" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT sum("count") / 3 AS "swaps" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-exchange-swaps" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT sum("count") / 3 AS "transfers" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-exchange-do_tx_transfers" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT sum("count") AS "sigverify-recv" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-packets_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "banking" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-entries_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "record" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."record_stage-signals_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "lwrite" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."ledger_writer_stage-entries_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "fetchstage" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."packets-recv_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "broadcast" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast_service-entries_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "banking" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-process_packets" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "sigverify-send" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-verified_packets_send" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "retransmit" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."retransmit-stage" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "sigverify" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-time_ms" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "banking" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-time_ms" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "request" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."request_stage-time_ms" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "write" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."ledger_writer_stage-time_ms" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "broadcast" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast_service-time_ms" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "banking_stall" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-stall_time_ms" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "banking_buffered" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-buffered_packet_time_ms" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-forks_set_root_ms" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("squash_accounts_ms")  AS "squash_account" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-observed" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("squash_cache_ms")  AS "squash_cache" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-observed" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-buffered_packets" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-forwarded_packets" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-consumed_buffered_packets" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-rebuffered_packets" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."fetch_stage-honor_forwards" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."fetch_stage-discard_forwards" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."poh_recorder-tick_lock_contention" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."poh_recorder-record_lock_contention" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."poh_recorder-tick_overhead" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") AS "retransmit" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."streamer-recv_window-retransmit" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "window receive" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."streamer-recv_window-recv" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "broadcast sent" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."streamer-broadcast-sent" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT last("repair-ix") AS "repair-ix" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-repair" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("repair-slot") AS "repair-slot" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-repair" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("repair-orphan") AS "slot" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-repair_orphan" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("repair-highest-slot") AS "slot" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-repair_highest" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("repair-highest-ix") AS "ix" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-repair_highest" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") AS "window receive" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."streamer-recv_window-recv" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "window receive" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."streamer-recv_window-consume" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT last("consumed") AS "validator" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."window-stage" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT last("transmit-index") AS "leader" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast-service" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT last("latest") - last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-vote" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("slot") - last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-observed" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Tower Distance in Latest and Root Slot ($hostid)

targets.query: SELECT last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-vote" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-observed" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT median("slot") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-new_leader" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("packets_received") as "packets_received" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("receive_errors") as "receive_errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rcvbuf_errors") as "rcvbuf_errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("packets_sent") as "packets_sent" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("in_octets") as "recv" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("out_octets") as "sent" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT max("total_time_ms") AS "max" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-total_verify_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)

SELECT mean(fork) as fork, mean(parent) as parent, mean(last) as percentage_stake, count(host_id) as nodes_reporting from (SELECT fork, parent, last, host_id from (SELECT fork, root, parent, last(percentage_stake) FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."stake-percentage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY fork_tag, host_id) WHERE fork > root AND root != 0) GROUP BY fork_tag
